title: [K-12] Ubiquitous Science Education Design Using Mobile Learning Agents

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific theories and digital document utilization skills
context.additional_context: Learners access asynchronous learning content anytime via personal devices (tablets/smartphones) and receive customized science materials (papers, lab videos, simulation tools, etc.) through mobile learning agents

learning_goals: Learners can independently explore digital science documents at least three times per week and write summary reports using a mobile learning agent
Learners can analyze virtual experiment results and submit reports at least twice per quarter using science experiment simulation tools provided on mobile devices
Learners can explore and present key findings from at least ten recent scientific research trends linked to their major within six months via a recommendation algorithm in a mobile learning agent
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
